name: WP Testimonial Carousel
author: umakant_dataman

sections.description:
WP Testimonial Carousel Plugin is for Add Testimonials with this Shortcode ‘[testimonials]’.

Shortcode Options

As of version 1.0, Please use ‘[testimonials]’ or <?php echo do_shortcode('[testimonials]'); ?> shortcodes.

Credits

This plugin was written by Dataman WordPress Team.
sections.installation:
The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “WP Testimonial Carousel”
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the plugin

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file from this page and unzip the contents
  2. Upload the dm-responsive-testimonial-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the dm-responsive-testimonial-slider plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once Activated

  1. Place the [testimonials] shortcode in a Page or Post
  2. Create new items in the testimonials post type, uploading a Featured Image for each.
